title: Project-Based Education for Improving Information Literacy for Adult Citizens

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and routine information retrieval experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening information evaluation and application skills through real-life problem-solving in science fields.

learning_goals: Learners accurately identify credible information from scientific digital sources (websites, papers, statistics, etc.) with over 80% precision
Learners systematically apply information gathered through PBL activities to solve scientific problems and produce concrete outcomes
Learners can ethically reconstruct/share information in scientifically valid ways while considering information ethics and copyright issues
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
